blogPost.excerpt: Booste APIs boiling all the pains of the production ML stack into a single line of code. We're super excited to launch an API to OpenAI's powerful new no-training-needed image classifier to Python and Node. Give it a spin!
blogPost.body: Booste APIs boiling all the pains of the production ML stack into a single line of code. We're super excited to launch an API to OpenAI's powerful new no-training-needed image classifier to Python and Node. Give it a spin!
blogPost.title: CLIP API by Booste - Use OpenAI's newest image classifier with one line of code.
blogPost.author: Erik Dunteman

localize.description: Booste APIs将生产ML堆栈的所有痛苦归结为一行代码。我们非常兴奋地推出了OpenAI强大的新的无需训练的图像分类器的API到Python和Node。快来试试吧
localize.tagline: 使用OpenAI最新的图像分类器，只需一行代码。

localize.description: Booste APIs將生產ML堆棧的所有痛苦歸結爲一行代碼。我們非常興奮地推出了OpenAI強大的新的無需訓練的圖像分類器的API到Python和Node。快來試試吧
localize.tagline: 使用OpenAI最新的圖像分類器，只需一行代碼。

previous.excerpt: Sotion lets you add password access to your Notion page. Put your Notion page at your own domain with a password access page in front of it.
previous.title: Sotion.so - Password access for Notion pages

localize.description: Sotion可以让你在你的Notion页面上添加密码访问。把你的Notion页面放在你自己的域名上，并在它前面加上密码访问页面。
Sotion可以讓你在你的Notion頁面上添加密碼訪問。把你的Notion頁面放在你自己的域名上，並在它前面加上密碼訪問頁面。

next.excerpt: Well-ordered, extremely user friendly app that will make your invoicing a child's play. Generate professional PDF invoices in a glance. Change your logo, labels and more to make your invoice fit your business requirements.
next.title: Dippper - The simplest online tool for creating high-quality invoices.

localize.description: 秩序井然，极其人性化的应用，让你的发票开具变得像个孩子一样。生成专业的PDF发票，一目了然。更改你的商标、标签等，让你的发票符合你的业务要求。
localize.tagline: 创建高质量发票的最简单的在线工具。

localize.description: 秩序井然，極其人性化的應用，讓你的發票開具變得像個孩子一樣。生成專業的PDF發票，一目瞭然。更改你的商標、標籤等，讓你的發票符合你的業務要求。
localize.tagline: 創建高質量發票的最簡單的在線工具。
